caption: A conversion of a Cutter for a Necromunda Corpse Grinder Cult Gang.
alt: An unpainted conversion piece using bits from the Corpse Grinder Cults kit and the Eightbound Kit

caption: The back of the conversion of a Cutter for a Necromunda Corpse Grinder Cult Gang.
alt: An unpainted conversion piece using bits from the Corpse Grinder Cults kit and the Eightbound Kit

caption: A conversion of a Squat gang member for Necromunda.
alt: A squat with a power fist and a shotgun and a short coat. Using bits from the Hernkyn Pioneers and Tempestus Scions as well as Green Stuff sculpting.

caption: This model is painted at Basic Tier level with additional freehands.
alt: A squat with a power fist and a shotgun and a short coat. Using bits from the Hernkyn Pioneers and Tempestus Scions as well as Green Stuff sculpting.

caption: A conversion of a Cutter for a Necromunda Corpse Grinder Cult Gang.
alt: A painted conversion of a Cutter for a Necromunda Corpse Grinder Cult Gang. Using the Jackals kit and the Corpse Grinder Cults kit.

caption: This model is painted at a level somewhere between Basic Tier and Parade Ready Tier.
alt: A painted conversion of a Cutter for a Necromunda Corpse Grinder Cult Gang. Using the Jackals kit and the Corpse Grinder Cults kit.

caption: My Gang Leader kitbash. This miniature is at Parade Ready Tier.
alt: A conversion using bits from the Tempestus Scions, Escher and Genestealer Cults as well as Greenstuff.

caption: Back view of the Gang Leader.
alt: A conversion using bits from the Tempestus Scions, Escher and Genestealer Cults as well as Greenstuff.

caption: Frontal view of the Gang Leader.
alt: A conversion using bits from the Tempestus Scions, Escher and Genestealer Cults as well as Greenstuff.

caption: A Wolf Scout, sad that they are gone from the codex supplement.
alt: A back view of a Space Marine Scout Model with additional Space Wolf parts.

caption: The front view of the Wolf Scout.
alt: A front view of a Space Marine Scout Model with additional Space Wolf parts.

caption: The Wolf Scout Pack Leader.
alt: A front view of a Space Marine Scout Model with additional Space Wolf parts.

caption: Two Aeldari Warlocks. These are at Basic Tier.
alt: Two Aeldari Warlocks made from parts from the Warlocks kit and the Genestealer Cults Magus.

caption: A Chaplain with powerfist at Basic Tier.
alt: A chaplain using parts from Tactical Space Marines, Greenstuff and the Judiciar head.

caption: Bullveye, Leader of the 13th Great Company as described in Wolf's Honour by Lee Lightner.
alt: A conversion of several Chaos and Space Marine parts depicting a bald Space Wolves character wielding a black power axe and pointing a bolt pistol forward.

caption: The artwork on Bulveye's right pauldron depicts a space Wolf slaying a giant Serpent, reminiscent of the artwork on Bjorn's Dreadnought chassis.
alt: A conversion of several Chaos and Space Marine parts depicting a bald Space Wolves character wielding a black power axe and pointing a bolt pistol forward.

caption: Bulveye's left pauldron is inscribed with runes and symbols. This model would count as the higher end of the Parade Ready Tier.
alt: A conversion of several Chaos and Space Marine parts depicting a bald Space Wolves character wielding a black power axe and pointing a bolt pistol forward.

caption: A Leagues of Votann banner bearer smoking a pipe in the face of battle.
alt: A Hearthkyn Warrior holding a Dwarven Banner in his right and a smoking pipe in his left hand.

caption: A Wulfen Dreadnought based on the Brutalis chassis. This is the lower end of Parade Ready Tier with some small extras.
alt: A conversion of a Brutalis Dreadnought which uses various bits from the Space Wolves Venereable Dreadnought kit.

caption: The entire dreadnought.
alt: A conversion of a Brutalis Dreadnought which uses various bits from the Space Wolves Venereable Dreadnought kit.
